column4: Any HW gurus around? I'm trying to make sense of my "sensors" (lm_sensors) config... what is "nouveau-pci-0300" PCI adapter... what does it refer to?
that's the GPU sensors exposed by the nouveau driver
So the sensors-output is the temperature of the GPU? ... wow...
Most likely, yes... or fan speed
It's a server with a ION chip embedded
Strange thing though... "lm_sensors" is reporting that high is +100 and crit is +95... shouldn't crit be above "high" ?
